dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violence
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, November 20, 2005 6:06 PM
To: support@bucksmatrix.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violence]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright violence
Date: Sun, 20 Nov 2005 17:43:17 +0100
From: BucksMatrix.com Support Team <support@bucksmatrix.com>
Reply-To: BucksMatrix.com Support Team <support@bucksmatrix.com>
Organization: BucksMatrix.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sirs,

The owner of funnyboyspics.com (70.84.35.70) hosted by your company uses
copyrighted graphic material of our sites www.teenboydreams.com &
www.teenboysmag.com WITHOUT our permission. Also he refused our request to
remove them.

You can find our images at:

http://www.funnyboyspics.com/gaygalls/d25e36/
http://www.funnyboyspics.com/gaygalls/d25e36/01.jpg

http://www.funnyboyspics.com/gaygalls/8b5811/
http://www.funnyboyspics.com/gaygalls/8b5811/02.jpg

http://www.funnyboyspics.com/gaygalls/efde76/
http://www.funnyboyspics.com/gaygalls/efde76/03.jpg

and not only there.

I'll be obliged if you could DEACTIVATE his account at your company ASAP and
force him to remove all the stolen content.

- --
Best regards,
Anton.
BucksMatrix.com Support Team.




- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDgQ9pvK/XpJs6oyURAoHyAKCJUNHXbVTdwFgpotJrrNfEmacLqACfb9Ge
fCV8gwvfwB9gdSUwjvDcz9U=
=8vdz
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
